#SETUP: DecimalSupport

// These tests are beyond SQLDecimal range.

>> Text(100000000000, "0")
"100000000000"

>> Text(1000000000000, "0")
"1000000000000"

>> Text(10000000000000, "0")
"10000000000000"

>> Text(100000000000000, "0")
"100000000000000"

>> Text(1E+15, "0")
"1000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+16, "0")
"10000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+17, "0")
"100000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+18, "0")
"1000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+19, "0")
"10000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+20, "0")
"100000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+21, "0")
"1000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+22, "0")
"10000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+23, "0")
"100000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+24, "0")
"1000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+25, "0")
"10000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+26, "0")
"100000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+27, "0")
"1000000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+28, "0")
"10000000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(100000000000, "#")
"100000000000"

>> Text(1000000000000, "#")
"1000000000000"

>> Text(10000000000000, "#")
"10000000000000"

>> Text(100000000000000, "#")
"100000000000000"

>> Text(1E+15, "#")
"1000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+16, "#")
"10000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+17, "#")
"100000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+18, "#")
"1000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+19, "#")
"10000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+20, "#")
"100000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+21, "#")
"1000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+22, "#")
"10000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+23, "#")
"100000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+24, "#")
"1000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+25, "#")
"10000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+26, "#")
"100000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+27, "#")
"1000000000000000000000000000"

>> Text(1E+28, "#")
"10000000000000000000000000000"
